eu.play_project.play_commons.constants

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.play_project.play_commons.constants.Constants

  • public class Constants
extends Object
    Properties for the PLAY Project. This class reads the file play-commons-constants.properties from the classpath and also has a default file included in the JAR. You can create you own properties file by adapting the defaults.
    Author:
    Roland St√ºhmer

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        public static Properties getProperties()
        Get the default PLAY properties. Several consecutive calls will return the cached Properties object.

      • getProperties

        public static Properties getProperties(String fileName)
        Produce properties from a specific properties file (to be found on the classpath).

      • getProperties

        public static Properties getProperties(String fileName,
                       Properties defaultProperties)
        Produce properties from a specific properties file (to be found on the classpath). The second parameter passes a default properties object.
